text:
@SpeakerPelosi What’s in Nancy Pelosi's bill to supposedly deal with Coronavirus?
– Mandates climate change studies
– Forces airlines to spend money on carbon offsets—not workers
– Massive union giveaways

She's holding the American people’s well-being hostage to her liberal agenda. Shameless.
